!Warrior's Grave: The only hope is for you to become an Elrokian warrior, the one destined to wield Gazkh! But wait! Gazkh is no toy to be picked up on a whim. It is as dangerous as a serpent, as powerful as fire itself! You must prove yourself worthy to be its owner. Stranger, I see that you are already wise and brave. But that alone is not enough. If you wish to travel this path, there is one more task you must perform. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 warriorgrave_q126_17.htm|"What is it?"]
